# i'm bariskurt

[![Linkedin Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/-bariskurt-blue?style=flat&logo=Linkedin&logoColor=white&link=https://www.linkedin.com/in/-bariskurt-/)](https://www.linkedin.com/in/-bariskurt-/)

[![Discord Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/-yNkes%235006-5865F2?style=flat&logo=Discord&logoColor=white&link=https://discordapp.com/users/360003171546038272)](https://discordapp.com/users/360003171546038272)
[![GMX Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/-bariskurt@gmx.com-1c449b?style=flat&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&logoColor=white&link=mailto:bariskurt@gmx.com)](mailto:bariskurt@gmx.com)

A self-taught software developer who worked in a lot of fields of IT and am passionate about playing & making games. 
I developed lots of projects for desktop, web, and mobile (especially Rockstar Games's GTA Multiplayer). 

The most important skills of me: having a sharp eye for detail, fast learning and code optimization. I have been making games and prototypes with C# in Unity for over 2 years now. I also have knowledge of networking and hardware which has developed throughout the years. In addition to that, I'm quite interested in design and care about the visuality of my projects.
</br></br>
## my latest works
- [TAVOOK](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aSoeugy7Nrs): TAVOOK is a game where you keep the board balanced to save falling "tavooks".
- [Chase Them All](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ud2waXZdPko): You need to catch all suspects, avoid civilians and make justice.
- [Untitled Traffic Cam Project](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EN2O8EKSm-U): You play as a Traffic Enforcement System and your duty is detect, release and fine the guilties.
- [Nailstack Clone](https://github.com/baris-kurt/Nail-Stack-Game-Clone): It's a clone of the Nailstack's core mechanic. (Without parent constraints)
